title: Cannot reset botched IDA setting
content:
I managed to accidentally modify the opcode column setting of the view window to display the data in word format (2 byte).  For the life of me I cannot seem to figure how to switch if back to byte format.  Resetting the desktop does not work.  I could use some advice.

Thanks
Jim

answers_data.content: AFAIK this is standard format for some processors (such as 68K) and canâ€™t be changed by the user. You can see the separate bytes in the Hex View (synchronize it with IDA View to see the bytes corresponding to the current instruction).

comments.text: Thanks for pointing that out.  Yes, I am using IDA for some 68K firmware and didn't realize that.  I spent a bunch of time looking for a way to change the setting.  Take care -
